name: The SHORTEST RUNWAY in the WORLD! Flying the Winair Twin Otter: St Maarten to Saba [2020]
description:
Try Dashlane for FREE on your first device by heading to http://www.dashlane.com/paul
then, when you want to upgrade to Premium use my code PAUL for a discount!

**This video is from February 2020 before the lockdown**

I hope you are all doing well during lockdown/quarantine or during whatever situation you currently have in your country. I'm excited to see the first green shoots of recovery, with some countries in Europe beginning to reopen for tourists next month! Stick with it and we will be back in the air soon! Today's video features a Winair Twin Otter trip to Saba, the world's shortest runway and one of the most "dangerous" airports to fly into! 

Follow me on Twitter: @paul_winginit ¬¶ https://twitter.com/paul_winginit

Follow me on Instagram: paul_winginit ¬¶ https://www.instagram.com/paul_winginit

My website: www.winginit.me

Date of Travel: 19 FEB 2020
Airline: Winair
Livery: Standard Winair
Route: SXM-SAB-SXM
Aircraft: DHC-6 Twin Otter
Flight Number: WM 435, WM 442
Miles: 28+28
Airborne time: 0h13m, 0h12m

If you want to find out more about my future plans and join in conversations I have about travel, follow me on Twitter: @paul_winginit. I‚Äôve started using it properly now and it would be great to see some of you there too.
